title: HR Management Practical Skills Enhancement: Virtual Reality-Based Cell Division Inquiry Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain the key phases of cell division (mitosis, meiosis) in 3D virtual reality.
Learners can analyze cell division-related problem scenarios presented in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) scenario using VR tools and propose scientific solutions.
Through VR-based Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) activities, learners can exploratorily discover core mechanisms of the cell division process and express them through visual modeling.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
